headline: BMO Capital Raises PT on The Progressive Corporation (PGR) to $260 From $247, Maintains a Market Perform Rating
summary: The Progressive Corporation (NYSE:PGR) is one of the best low volatility large cap stocks to invest in. BMO Capital analyst Michael Zaremski lifted the price target for The Progressive Corporation (NYSE:PGR) to $260 from $247 on November 21 while keeping a Market Perform rating on the shares. The rating update came after the company reported its […]
